title: Eulimacrostoma fusus
text:
Eulimacrostoma fuscus is a <a href="species">species</a> of <a href="sea%20snail">sea snail</a>, a <a href="marine%20%28ocean%29">marine</a> <a href="gastropod">gastropod</a> <a href="mollusk">mollusk</a> in the <a href="family%20%28biology%29">family</a> <a href="Eulimidae">Eulimidae</a>. The species was previously one of a number within the genus "<a href="Eulima">Eulima</a>".
Distribution.
This species occurs in the following locations:
Description.
The maximum recorded <a href="gastropod%20shell">shell</a> length is 13.3 mm.
Habitat.
Minimum recorded depth is 110 m. Maximum recorded depth is 1170 m.
